cause.description:
A place to donate money to the CCFA, a place to help raise awareness. A place to make ideas for fundraisers to help those with a small voice.
1. Crohn's and Colitis is something horrible and sometimes unbearable to live with
2. Everyone has the right to a normal life, and we should help people suffering from IBD get one
cause.mission: help fund research for the crohn's and colitis foundation of america (CCFA)
cause.name: Support the CCFA
